scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:apps && npm run build:main
scripts.build:shared: npm run build:types && cd shared/backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.build:apps: cd apps/ladm/backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.build:main: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.lint:apps: cd apps/ladm/backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd apps/ladm/backend && npm run lint:fix && cd ../frontend && npm run lint:fix
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd backend && rm -rf node_modules dist && cd ../frontend && rm -rf node_modules dist && cd ../apps/ladm/backend && rm -rf node_modules dist && cd ../frontend && rm -rf node_modules dist
